content:
Native deodorants are a popular choice among those looking for natural, effective, and gentle personal care products.

Yes, Target does carry Native deodorants! You can find them in the personal care section or online. Native offers a range of deodorant products, including their popular Natural Deodorant, Deodorant Wipes, and Deodorant Bars.

Target typically carries a variety of Native deodorant scents, such as Lavender & Rose, Eucalyptus Mint, and Unscented. You can check Target's website or visit your local store to see the exact selection.

As a bonus, Native deodorants are often priced around $10-$12, which means you can use your $5 off coupon to get a great deal!

If you're new to Native deodorants, you might want to consider trying their Natural Deodorant, which is a best-seller. It's made with natural ingredients, is free from harsh chemicals, and is gentle on skin.

Would you like to give Native deodorant a try?
